label: Requirement
requirement_text: Management body bears ultimate responsibility for ICT risk [cite: 745]

label: Requirement
requirement_text: Assign responsibility for managing ICT risk to a control function [cite: 772]

label: Requirement
requirement_text: Develop and document backup policies and restoration procedures [cite: 895,896]

label: Requirement
requirement_text: Carry out advanced testing (TLPT) at least every 3 years [cite: 1171]

label: Requirement
requirement_text: Contractual arrangements must include clear descriptions of all functions [cite: 1324]
